sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
What number should be subtracted from each of the numbers \(6 \), \(16 \), and \(22 \) to make the reminders be in continued proportion.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "Lets suppose that the required number is $y $.

Since the numbers $6 - y $, $16 - y $, $22 - y $, are in proportion, we have
\[
	\frac{6 - y }{16 - y } = \frac{16 - y }{22 - y }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (6 - y )(22 - y ) = (16 - y )(16 - y )
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 132 - y (28 ) + y ^2 = 256 - y (32 ) + y ^2
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow y (32 - 28 ) = 256 - 132 
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow y = \frac{256 - 132 }{32 - 28 }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow y = \frac{124 }{4 }
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow y = \frac{31 }{1 }
\]"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
